CustomField.description: Supplier Code is used in Watercares "EAM" as a unique identifier for any subcontractors (e.g. Hydrotech) that have been set up as "Purchasing Contracts"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: "Supplier" field on the Purchasing Contract in EAM (e.g. S00001004 for Hydrotech)
CustomField.label: Supplier Code
